product.name: Blockchain Grants
product.description: Secure funding for your blockchain projects through targeted grants.

overview.content: Blockchain Grants provides financial support for innovative projects in the blockchain space. With our funding, developers and startups can propel their ideas into reality.

howItWorks.content: Applying for a grant is straightforward. Simply fill out the application form on our website and submit your project proposal for review.

configuration.content: Setup your profile and track your application status through our user-friendly dashboard.

product.name: Remote Jobs
product.description: Get a website for listing remote jobs for job applicants.

overview.content: Arcade lets you create interactive product demos in minutes and turn all users into power users. Let users experience your product through interactive, guided demos. No more pausing and rewinding, users can progress at their own pace. This integration allows you to embed Arcade interactive demos into your BoringSites documentation.

howItWorks.content: Embedding an Arcade flow in your documentation is simple - just paste an Arcade flow link into the BoringSites editor. The app will turn the link into an Arcade embed showing your recorded demo.

configuration.content: To install on a single space, navigate to integrations in sub-navigation. If you prefer to install the Arcade integration on multiple or all spaces, navigate to your organization settings and enable it from the integrations panel. This will give you access to the custom arcade block.

product.name: Vetted Talent
product.description: Website for showing vetted talent for companies to hire.

overview.content: Slack enables you to integrate interactive demos into your Slack channels, allowing your team to explore and understand your product's features directly from Slack. No need to switch between apps or pause and rewind; team members can interact with the demos at their own pace, fostering better understanding and collaboration.

howItWorks.content: To add an Slack demo to your Slack channel, simply share an Slack flow link in the channel. Slack will automatically recognize and embed the interactive demo, making it accessible for your team to view and interact with directly within the Slack interface.

configuration.content: To get started, navigate to the Slack App marketplace and search for the Slack app. Once found, add it to your workspace. You can then share Slack demos in any channel by pasting the demo link, enhancing your team's collaboration and product knowledge.

product.name: Agency Hub
product.description: A classifieds platform to connect businesses with the best agencies and for agencies to receive offers from potential clients.

overview.content: Agency Hub is the premier marketplace for businesses seeking top-notch agencies and for agencies looking to expand their clientele. Whether you're a business seeking marketing, design, or IT services, or an agency looking to showcase your expertise, Agency Hub connects you to the right opportunities.

howItWorks.content: Businesses can browse agency profiles, review portfolios, and submit requests for proposals (RFPs). Agencies can manage their profiles, receive direct offers, and respond to RFPs from potential clients.

configuration.content: Set up your business or agency profile, specify the services you offer or need, and start connecting through our intuitive platform.

product.name: Support Groups Events
product.description: Find and organize support group meetings for mental health, addiction recovery, and more.

overview.content: Our platform connects individuals seeking support with a wide range of group events focused on various health issues.

howItWorks.content: Browse events by topic or location, register online, and gain the support you need in a community setting.

configuration.content: Create an account, set up event notifications, and manage your event participation through our user-friendly dashboard.

product.name: Top Talent Hub
product.description: Connect with top professionals and industry leaders to grow your career.

overview.content: Top Talent Hub is your gateway to meeting elite professionals and mentors in your field.

howItWorks.content: Get a profile, showcase your achievements, and connect with industry leaders.

configuration.content: Sign up, complete your profile, and start networking with other top-tier professionals.

product.name: Events Website
product.description: A dynamic platform for hosting and managing all types of events online.

overview.content: From small workshops to large conferences, our platform provides all the tools you need to create, manage, and promote your events.

howItWorks.content: Set up an event in minutes, customize your event page, and manage registrations and attendee communications.

configuration.content: Register as an event organizer, choose your plan, and start creating your event.

product.name: Starter Story
product.description: Learn from successful entrepreneurs and launch your startup using proven strategies.

overview.content: Starter Story showcases detailed interviews with entrepreneurs who share their process, challenges, and lessons learned.

howItWorks.content: Browse through our extensive collection of startup stories, find patterns and strategies that work, and apply them to your own business idea.

configuration.content: Subscribe for full access, customize your interests, and get weekly insights delivered to your inbox.

product.name: APK Store
product.description: A trusted platform for downloading Android apps and games.

overview.content: APK Store offers a wide range of free and paid Android applications, ensuring a safe and secure download experience.

howItWorks.content: Search for the app you need, review the details and user comments, and download directly to your device.

configuration.content: Create an account to keep track of your downloads and preferences.

product.name: APK Store
product.description: A trusted platform for downloading Android apps and games.

overview.content: APK Store offers a wide range of free and paid Android applications, ensuring a safe and secure download experience.

howItWorks.content: Search for the app you need, review the details and user comments, and download directly to your device.

configuration.content: Create an account to keep track of your downloads and preferences.

product.name: VCSheet
product.description: Streamline your investment tracking and analysis with VCSheet.

overview.content: VCSheet offers venture capitalists and investors a powerful tool to manage their portfolios and gain insights into market trends.

howItWorks.content: Input your investment data, use our analytics tools to assess performance, and generate reports to guide your future investment decisions.

configuration.content: Register your firm, set up your portfolio, and integrate with your existing financial systems.

product.name: Real Estate Website
product.description: Buy, sell, or rent properties with ease using our comprehensive real estate platform.

overview.content: Our website offers detailed property listings, virtual tours, and all the tools you need for a smooth real estate transaction.

howItWorks.content: Search for properties based on location, price, and features. Use our comparison tool to evaluate options and make informed decisions.

configuration.content: Register as a buyer, seller, or real estate agent. Customize your profile and preferences to optimize your experience.

product.name: Messaging Platforms Servers
product.description: Create and manage your own private servers on Discord, Telegram, and WhatsApp for business or personal use.

overview.content: Our service helps you set up and customize private servers for enhanced communication and collaboration.

howItWorks.content: Choose your platform, customize your server settings, invite members, and manage permissions for optimal security and functionality.

configuration.content: Follow our step-by-step guide to Get a server, integrate bots for automation, and adjust settings according to your needs.

product.name: SaaS Boilerplates
product.description: Jumpstart your SaaS application development with our ready-to-use code boilerplates.

overview.content: Our boilerplates provide the foundational code necessary to build scalable and secure SaaS applications quickly.

howItWorks.content: Select the boilerplate that fits your project, download it, and customize it to fit your specific needs.

configuration.content: Access our comprehensive documentation to understand how to deploy and modify the boilerplates effectively.

product.name: Mental Health Blogs
product.description: Explore and contribute to our collection of blogs focusing on mental health awareness and well-being.

overview.content: Our platform offers a space for sharing personal stories, expert advice, and research on mental health to foster understanding and support.

howItWorks.content: Browse our diverse range of topics, subscribe to categories of interest, and engage with the community through comments and shared experiences.

configuration.content: Sign up for an account, customize your reading preferences, and if you're a writer, submit your own blog posts for review.

product.name: Product Hunt
product.description: Discover new products, upvote your favorites, and engage with creators and other enthusiasts.

overview.content: Product Hunt surfaces the best new tech products, every day. It's a place for product-loving enthusiasts to share and geek out about the latest mobile apps, websites, hardware projects, and tech creations.

howItWorks.content: Browse new listings, upvote products you like, and join discussions to connect with the product community.

configuration.content: Get a profile, follow topics of interest, and stay updated with daily newsletters.
